sourcesContent:
<!-- eslint-disable vue/multi-word-component-names -->

<script>

export default {

    data() {
  return {
    products : ''
  }
},

methods: {
 async getProducts() {
    try {
          const products = await fetch (`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/`).then(r => r.json());
          this.products[0] = products
          console.log('yes', this.products)

    } catch (error) {
          this.$router.push('/')
          console.log('No hay nada que hacer')
    }
  }
},

created(){
   this.getProducts()
}


}
</script>
